content: Does the fact that a lot of my food ate plants count towards a "plant-based" diet?

My testosterone increased from 220 ng/dL (low for an 80 y/o man) to 1110 ng/dL (high for an 18 y/o) after I transitioned from the standard American diet to a whole food plant-based (healthy vegan) diet. I’m 59 - let’s compete athletically and see which of us are more masculine. https://t.co/KLdVjo50Xo
@00joeuhan @drjasonfung agree with sugar and agree that the devil is in the details. A whole-food plant based diet of corn is terrible just as is a butter and processed bacon high fat diet.
